metadata.title: Friday, 13th June, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) what policies the Government is implementing to enhance sports development, countrywide, especially in rural areas;
(b) what criteria are used to select players to the national football team;
(c) when the national football team last had a ‘school boy international player’; and
(d) whether the Government has overriding powers over the Football Association of Zambia in the administration of football in the country.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a boarding secondary school in Nabwalya Chiefdom in Mpika District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct day and boarding secondary schools in Kalabo District;
(b) if so, how many such schools will be constructed;
(c) when the plans will be implemented; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
